content.prompt: The addition of the Pazzi Chapel to the Basilica di Santa Croce exemplifies which of the following?

choices.label: A private familyâ€™s financial support for a monastic church through a building commission
The availability of land for new construction in dense urban zones
The need for additional spaces for congregational worship in crowded cities
A requirement that burials of private citizens occur outside of the church walls

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.4: Purpose and Audience in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
